title: Self-Directed Learning Strategy Design Using Large Language Model-Based Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and prior language-learning experience
context.additional_context: Non-degree language education program for working professionals. Self-directed learning participation in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: Learners can improve task performance efficiency by over 30% when utilizing LLM chatbots.
Learners can maintain knowledge transfer capabilities above 80% after using chatbot tools.
Learners can develop and apply at least three prompt-scaffolding strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
